titleStmt.title: The lords spiritual and temporal, assembled at the House of Lords, Westminster, December 25, 1688
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Awnsham and William Churchill ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and torn, with slight loss of print.
The request of the House of Lords to the Prince of Orange that he accept the care of the nation, and call parliamentary elections.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
